Class Position

  • java.lang.Object
    • Position

  • public class Position
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the current position of any valid player. A Position's distance can be zero, in this case, the Position is in the from town.
    Version:
    17/11-2018 17:00, version 1.1
    Author:
    Steffen W. Christensen

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Position(City from, City to, int distance)
      Constructor for the Position object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getDistance()
      Returns the distance between Position and end city, for example, "2".
      City getFrom()
      Returns the current Position's start city, for example, "cityA".
      City getTo()
      Returns the current Position's end city, for example, "cityB".
      int getTotal()
      Returns the total distance of Road/between start and end city, for example, "4".
      boolean hasArrived()
      Returns boolean stating if the Position's distance is zero, meaning the Position has arrived at his destination if true.
      boolean move()
      Reduces distance by one and returns true if the Position can be moved, meaning the Position will be moved one step closer to their target.
      void turnAround()
      Swaps the start and destination cities, so that the player can return to where they began.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Position

        public Position(City from,
                City to,
                int distance)
        Constructor for the Position object.
        Parameters:
        from - City where the player started/opposite direction of which the player is walking.
        to - City where the player is headed.
        distance - Distance between these two cities.

    • Method Detail

      • getDistance

        public int getDistance()
        Returns the distance between Position and end city, for example, "2".
        Returns:
        The Position's current distance.

      • getFrom

        public City getFrom()
        Returns the current Position's start city, for example, "cityA".
        Returns:
        The Position's start.

      • getTo

        public City getTo()
        Returns the current Position's end city, for example, "cityB".
        Returns:
        The Position's destination.

      • getTotal

        public int getTotal()
        Returns the total distance of Road/between start and end city, for example, "4".
        Returns:
        The Position's total distance.

      • hasArrived

        public boolean hasArrived()
        Returns boolean stating if the Position's distance is zero, meaning the Position has arrived at his destination if true.
        Returns:
        Boolean stating if the Position has arrived.

      • move

        public boolean move()
        Reduces distance by one and returns true if the Position can be moved, meaning the Position will be moved one step closer to their target.
        Returns:
        Boolean stating if the Position has moved.

      • turnAround

        public void turnAround()
        Swaps the start and destination cities, so that the player can return to where they began. Also calculates new distance.
